testsuite.name: CoffeeMachineTest

testcase.name: start

failure.message:
java.lang.AssertionError: Wrong answer in test #1
For the input 25 your program output: write how many grams of coffee beans the coffee machine has: but the amount of beans should be 375
Please find below the output of your program during this failed test. Note that the '>' character indicates the beginning of the input line.
---
Write how many ml of water the coffee machine has: > 25 Write how many ml of milk the coffee machine has: Write how many grams of coffee beans the coffee machine has: Write how many cups of coffee you will need: Yes, I can make that amount of coffee
